00075 static int text_font_draw(SpaceText *UNUSED(st), int x, int y, const char *str)
00076 {
00077     BLF_position(mono, x, y, 0);
00078     BLF_draw(mono, str, BLF_DRAW_STR_DUMMY_MAX);
00079 
00080     return BLF_width(mono, str);
00081 }

00083 static int text_font_draw_character(SpaceText *st, int x, int y, char c)
00084 {
00085     char str[2];
00086     str[0] = c;
00087     str[1] = '\0';
00088 
00089     BLF_position(mono, x, y, 0);
00090     BLF_draw(mono, str, 1);
00091 
00092     return st->cwidth;
00093 }

00095 static int text_font_draw_character_utf8(SpaceText *st, int x, int y, const char *c)
00096 {
00097     char str[BLI_UTF8_MAX + 1];
00098     size_t len = BLI_str_utf8_size(c);
00099     memcpy(str, c, len);
00100     str[len] = '\0';
00101 
00102     BLF_position(mono, x, y, 0);
00103     BLF_draw(mono, str, len);
00104 
00105     return st->cwidth;
00106 }

00108 /****************** flatten string **********************/
00109 
00110 static void flatten_string_append(FlattenString *fs, const char *c, int accum, int len) 
00111 {
00112     int i;
00113     
00114     if (fs->pos + len > fs->len) {
00115         char *nbuf; int *naccum;
00116         fs->len *= 2;
00117 
00118         nbuf = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*fs->buf) * fs->len, "fs->buf");
00119         naccum = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*fs->accum) * fs->len, "fs->accum");
00120 
00121         memcpy(nbuf, fs->buf, fs->pos * sizeof(*fs->buf));
00122         memcpy(naccum, fs->accum, fs->pos * sizeof(*fs->accum));
00123         
00124         if (fs->buf != fs->fixedbuf) {
00125             MEM_freeN(fs->buf);
00126             MEM_freeN(fs->accum);
00127         }
00128         
00129         fs->buf = nbuf;
00130         fs->accum = naccum;
00131     }
00132     
00133     for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
00134     {
00135         fs->buf[fs->pos + i] = c[i];
00136         fs->accum[fs->pos + i] = accum;
00137     }
00138 
00139     fs->pos += len;
00140 }
00141 
00142 int flatten_string(SpaceText *st, FlattenString *fs, const char *in)
00143 {
00144     int r, i, total = 0;
00145 
00146     memset(fs, 0, sizeof(FlattenString));
00147     fs->buf = fs->fixedbuf;
00148     fs->accum = fs->fixedaccum;
00149     fs->len = sizeof(fs->fixedbuf);
00150 
00151     for (r = 0, i = 0; *in; r++) {
00152         if (*in == '\t') {
00153             i = st->tabnumber - (total % st->tabnumber);
00154             total += i;
00155             
00156             while (i--)
00157                 flatten_string_append(fs, " ", r, 1);
00158             
00159             in++;
00160         }
00161         else {
00162             size_t len = BLI_str_utf8_size(in);
00163             flatten_string_append(fs, in, r, len);
00164             in += len;
00165             total++;
00166         }
00167     }
00168     
00169     flatten_string_append(fs, "\0", r, 1);
00170 
00171     return total;
00172 }
00173 
00174 void flatten_string_free(FlattenString *fs)
00175 {
00176     if (fs->buf != fs->fixedbuf)
00177         MEM_freeN(fs->buf);
00178     if (fs->accum != fs->fixedaccum)
00179         MEM_freeN(fs->accum);
00180 }

00182 /* Checks the specified source string for a Python built-in function name. This
00183  * name must start at the beginning of the source string and must be followed by
00184  * a non-identifier (see text_check_identifier(char)) or null character.
00185  * 
00186  * If a built-in function is found, the length of the matching name is returned.
00187  * Otherwise, -1 is returned.
00188  *
00189  * See:
00190  * http://docs.python.org/py3k/reference/lexical_analysis.html#keywords
00191  */
00192 
00193 static int find_builtinfunc(char *string)
00194 {
00195     int a, i;
00196     const char *builtinfuncs[] = {
00197         /* "False", "None", "True", */ /* see find_bool() */
00198         "and", "as", "assert", "break",
00199         "class", "continue", "def", "del", "elif", "else", "except",
00200         "finally", "for", "from", "global", "if", "import", "in",
00201         "is", "lambda", "nonlocal", "not", "or", "pass", "raise",
00202         "return", "try", "while", "with", "yield",
00203     };
00204 
00205     for (a = 0; a < sizeof(builtinfuncs) / sizeof(builtinfuncs[0]); a++) {
00206         i = 0;
00207         while (1) {
00208             /* If we hit the end of a keyword... (eg. "def") */
00209             if (builtinfuncs[a][i] == '\0') {
00210                 /* If we still have identifier chars in the source (eg. "definate") */
00211                 if (text_check_identifier(string[i]))
00212                     i = -1;  /* No match */
00213                 break; /* Next keyword if no match, otherwise we're done */
00214                 
00215                 /* If chars mismatch, move on to next keyword */
00216             }
00217             else if (string[i] != builtinfuncs[a][i]) {
00218                 i = -1;
00219                 break; /* Break inner loop, start next keyword */
00220             }
00221             i++;
00222         }
00223         if (i > 0) break;  /* If we have a match, we're done */
00224     }
00225     return i;
00226 }
00227 
00228 /* Checks the specified source string for a Python special name. This name must
00229  * start at the beginning of the source string and must be followed by a non-
00230  * identifier (see text_check_identifier(char)) or null character.
00231  * 
00232  * If a special name is found, the length of the matching name is returned.
00233  * Otherwise, -1 is returned. */
00234 
00235 static int find_specialvar(char *string) 
00236 {
00237     int i = 0;
00238     /* Check for "def" */
00239     if (string[0] == 'd' && string[1] == 'e' && string[2] == 'f')
00240         i = 3;
00241     /* Check for "class" */
00242     else if (string[0] == 'c' && string[1] == 'l' && string[2] == 'a' && string[3] == 's' && string[4] == 's')
00243         i = 5;
00244     /* If next source char is an identifier (eg. 'i' in "definate") no match */
00245     if (i == 0 || text_check_identifier(string[i]))
00246         return -1;
00247     return i;
00248 }
00249 
00250 static int find_decorator(char *string) 
00251 {
00252     if (string[0] == '@') {
00253         int i = 1;
00254         while (text_check_identifier(string[i])) {
00255             i++;
00256         }
00257         return i;
00258     }
00259     return -1;
00260 }
00261 
00262 static int find_bool(char *string) 
00263 {
00264     int i = 0;
00265     /* Check for "False" */
00266     if (string[0] == 'F' && string[1] == 'a' && string[2] == 'l' && string[3] == 's' && string[4] == 'e')
00267         i = 5;
00268     /* Check for "True" */
00269     else if (string[0] == 'T' && string[1] == 'r' && string[2] == 'u' && string[3] == 'e')
00270         i = 4;
00271     /* Check for "None" */
00272     else if (string[0] == 'N' && string[1] == 'o' && string[2] == 'n' && string[3] == 'e')
00273         i = 4;
00274     /* If next source char is an identifier (eg. 'i' in "definate") no match */
00275     if (i == 0 || text_check_identifier(string[i]))
00276         return -1;
00277     return i;
00278 }

00280 /* Ensures the format string for the given line is long enough, reallocating
00281  * as needed. Allocation is done here, alone, to ensure consistency. */
00282 static int text_check_format_len(TextLine *line, unsigned int len)
00283 {
00284     if (line->format) {
00285         if (strlen(line->format) < len) {
00286             MEM_freeN(line->format);
00287             line->format = MEM_mallocN(len + 2, "SyntaxFormat");
00288             if (!line->format) return 0;
00289         }
00290     }
00291     else {
00292         line->format = MEM_mallocN(len + 2, "SyntaxFormat");
00293         if (!line->format) return 0;
00294     }
00295 
00296     return 1;
00297 }
00298 
00299 /* Formats the specified line. If do_next is set, the process will move on to
00300  * the succeeding line if it is affected (eg. multiline strings). Format strings
00301  * may contain any of the following characters:
00302  *  '_'  Whitespace
00303  *  '#'  Comment text
00304  *  '!'  Punctuation and other symbols
00305  *  'n'  Numerals
00306  *  'l'  String letters
00307  *  'v'  Special variables (class, def)
00308  *  'b'  Built-in names (print, for, etc.)
00309  *  'q'  Other text (identifiers, etc.)
00310  * It is terminated with a null-terminator '\0' followed by a continuation
00311  * flag indicating whether the line is part of a multi-line string. */
00312 
00313 static void txt_format_line(SpaceText *st, TextLine *line, int do_next)
00314 {
00315     FlattenString fs;
00316     char *str, *fmt, orig, cont, find, prev = ' ';
00317     int len, i;
00318 
00319     /* Get continuation from previous line */
00320     if (line->prev && line->prev->format != NULL) {
00321         fmt = line->prev->format;
00322         cont = fmt[strlen(fmt) + 1]; /* Just after the null-terminator */
00323     }
00324     else cont = 0;
00325 
00326     /* Get original continuation from this line */
00327     if (line->format != NULL) {
00328         fmt = line->format;
00329         orig = fmt[strlen(fmt) + 1]; /* Just after the null-terminator */
00330     }
00331     else orig = 0xFF;
00332 
00333     len = flatten_string(st, &fs, line->line);
00334     str = fs.buf;
00335     if (!text_check_format_len(line, len)) {
00336         flatten_string_free(&fs);
00337         return;
00338     }
00339     fmt = line->format;
00340 
00341     while (*str) {
00342         /* Handle escape sequences by skipping both \ and next char */
00343         if (*str == '\\') {
00344             *fmt = prev; fmt++; str++;
00345             if (*str == '\0') break;
00346             *fmt = prev; fmt++; str += BLI_str_utf8_size(str);
00347             continue;
00348         }
00349         /* Handle continuations */
00350         else if (cont) {
00351             /* Triple strings ("""...""" or '''...''') */
00352             if (cont & TXT_TRISTR) {
00353                 find = (cont & TXT_DBLQUOTSTR) ? '"' : '\'';
00354                 if (*str == find && *(str + 1) == find && *(str + 2) == find) {
00355                     *fmt = 'l'; fmt++; str++;
00356                     *fmt = 'l'; fmt++; str++;
00357                     cont = 0;
00358                 }
00359                 /* Handle other strings */
00360             }
00361             else {
00362                 find = (cont & TXT_DBLQUOTSTR) ? '"' : '\'';
00363                 if (*str == find) cont = 0;
00364             }
00365 
00366             *fmt = 'l';
00367             str += BLI_str_utf8_size(str) - 1;
00368         }
00369         /* Not in a string... */
00370         else {
00371             /* Deal with comments first */
00372             if (prev == '#' || *str == '#') {
00373                 *fmt = '#';
00374                 str += BLI_str_utf8_size(str) - 1;
00375             }
00376             else if (*str == '"' || *str == '\'') {
00377                 /* Strings */
00378                 find = *str;
00379                 cont = (*str == '"') ? TXT_DBLQUOTSTR : TXT_SNGQUOTSTR;
00380                 if (*(str + 1) == find && *(str + 2) == find) {
00381                     *fmt = 'l'; fmt++; str++;
00382                     *fmt = 'l'; fmt++; str++;
00383                     cont |= TXT_TRISTR;
00384                 }
00385                 *fmt = 'l';
00386             }
00387             /* Whitespace (all ws. has been converted to spaces) */
00388             else if (*str == ' ')
00389                 *fmt = '_';
00390             /* Numbers (digits not part of an identifier and periods followed by digits) */
00391             else if ((prev != 'q' && text_check_digit(*str)) || (*str == '.' && text_check_digit(*(str + 1))))
00392                 *fmt = 'n';
00393             /* Booleans */
00394             else if (prev != 'q' && (i = find_bool(str)) != -1)
00395                 if (i > 0) {
00396                     while (i > 1) {
00397                         *fmt = 'n'; fmt++; str++;
00398                         i--;
00399                     }
00400                     *fmt = 'n';
00401                 }
00402                 else {
00403                     str += BLI_str_utf8_size(str) - 1;
00404                     *fmt = 'q';
00405                 }
00406             /* Punctuation */
00407             else if (text_check_delim(*str))
00408                 *fmt = '!';
00409             /* Identifiers and other text (no previous ws. or delims. so text continues) */
00410             else if (prev == 'q') {
00411                 str += BLI_str_utf8_size(str) - 1;
00412                 *fmt = 'q';
00413             }
00414             /* Not ws, a digit, punct, or continuing text. Must be new, check for special words */
00415             else {
00416                 /* Special vars(v) or built-in keywords(b) */
00417                 if ((i = find_specialvar(str)) != -1)
00418                     prev = 'v';
00419                 else if ((i = find_builtinfunc(str)) != -1)
00420                     prev = 'b';
00421                 else if ((i = find_decorator(str)) != -1)
00422                     prev = 'v';  /* could have a new color for this */
00423                 if (i > 0) {
00424                     while (i > 1) {
00425                         *fmt = prev; fmt++; str++;
00426                         i--;
00427                     }
00428                     *fmt = prev;
00429                 }
00430                 else {
00431                     str += BLI_str_utf8_size(str) - 1;
00432                     *fmt = 'q';
00433                 }
00434             }
00435         }
00436         prev = *fmt;
00437         fmt++;
00438         str++;
00439     }
00440 
00441     /* Terminate and add continuation char */
00442     *fmt = '\0'; fmt++;
00443     *fmt = cont;
00444 
00445     /* If continuation has changed and we're allowed, process the next line */
00446     if (cont != orig && do_next && line->next) {
00447         txt_format_line(st, line->next, do_next);
00448     }
00449     
00450     flatten_string_free(&fs);
00451 }

00466 /* Sets the current drawing color based on the format character specified */
00467 static void format_draw_color(char formatchar)
00468 {
00469     switch (formatchar) {
00470         case '_': /* Whitespace */
00471             break;
00472         case '!': /* Symbols */
00473             UI_ThemeColorBlend(TH_TEXT, TH_BACK, 0.5f);
00474             break;
00475         case '#': /* Comments */
00476             UI_ThemeColor(TH_SYNTAX_C);
00477             break;
00478         case 'n': /* Numerals */
00479             UI_ThemeColor(TH_SYNTAX_N);
00480             break;
00481         case 'l': /* Strings */
00482             UI_ThemeColor(TH_SYNTAX_L);
00483             break;
00484         case 'v': /* Specials: class, def */
00485             UI_ThemeColor(TH_SYNTAX_V);
00486             break;
00487         case 'b': /* Keywords: for, print, etc. */
00488             UI_ThemeColor(TH_SYNTAX_B);
00489             break;
00490         case 'q': /* Other text (identifiers) */
00491         default:
00492             UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
00493             break;
00494     }
00495 }

00497 /************************** draw text *****************************/
00498 
00499 /* Notes on word-wrap
00500  * --
00501  * All word-wrap functions follow the algorithm below to maintain consistency.
00502  *     line        The line to wrap (tabs converted to spaces)
00503  *     view_width    The maximum number of characters displayable in the region
00504  *                 This equals region_width/font_width for the region
00505  *     wrap_chars    Characters that allow wrapping. This equals [' ', '\t', '-']
00506  * 
00507  * def wrap(line, view_width, wrap_chars):
00508  *     draw_start = 0
00509  *     draw_end = view_width
00510  *     pos = 0
00511  *     for c in line:
00512  *         if pos-draw_start >= view_width:
00513  *             print line[draw_start:draw_end]
00514  *             draw_start = draw_end
00515  *             draw_end += view_width
00516  *         elif c in wrap_chars:
00517  *             draw_end = pos+1
00518  *         pos += 1
00519  *     print line[draw_start:]
00520  * 
00521  */
00522 
00523 int wrap_width(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
00524 {
00525     int winx = ar->winx - TXT_SCROLL_WIDTH;
00526     int x, max;
00527     
00528     x = st->showlinenrs ? TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC : TXT_OFFSET;
00529     max = st->cwidth ? (winx - x) / st->cwidth : 0;
00530     return max > 8 ? max : 8;
00531 }
00532 
00533 /* Sets (offl, offc) for transforming (line, curs) to its wrapped position */
00534 void wrap_offset(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, TextLine *linein, int cursin, int *offl, int *offc)
00535 {
00536     Text *text;
00537     TextLine *linep;
00538     int i, j, start, end, max, chop;
00539     char ch;
00540 
00541     *offl = *offc = 0;
00542 
00543     if (!st->text) return;
00544     if (!st->wordwrap) return;
00545 
00546     text = st->text;
00547 
00548     /* Move pointer to first visible line (top) */
00549     linep = text->lines.first;
00550     i = st->top;
00551     while (i > 0 && linep) {
00552         int lines = text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, linep->line);
00553 
00554         /* Line before top */
00555         if (linep == linein) {
00556             if (lines <= i)
00557                 /* no visible part of line */
00558                 return;
00559         }
00560 
00561         if (i - lines < 0) {
00562             break;
00563         }
00564         else {
00565             linep = linep->next;
00566             (*offl) += lines - 1;
00567             i -= lines;
00568         }
00569     }
00570 
00571     max = wrap_width(st, ar);
00572     cursin = txt_utf8_offset_to_index(linein->line, cursin);
00573 
00574     while (linep) {
00575         start = 0;
00576         end = max;
00577         chop = 1;
00578         *offc = 0;
00579         for (i = 0, j = 0; linep->line[j]; j += BLI_str_utf8_size(linep->line + j)) {
00580             int chars;
00581 
00582             /* Mimic replacement of tabs */
00583             ch = linep->line[j];
00584             if (ch == '\t') {
00585                 chars = st->tabnumber - i % st->tabnumber;
00586                 if (linep == linein && i < cursin) cursin += chars - 1;
00587                 ch = ' ';
00588             }
00589             else {
00590                 chars = 1;
00591             }
00592 
00593             while (chars--) {
00594                 if (i - start >= max) {
00595                     if (chop && linep == linein && i >= cursin) {
00596                         if (i == cursin) {
00597                             (*offl)++;
00598                             *offc -= end - start;
00599                         }
00600 
00601                         return;
00602                     }
00603 
00604                     (*offl)++;
00605                     *offc -= end - start;
00606 
00607                     start = end;
00608                     end += max;
00609                     chop = 1;
00610                 }
00611                 else if (ch == ' ' || ch == '-') {
00612                     end = i + 1;
00613                     chop = 0;
00614                     if (linep == linein && i >= cursin)
00615                         return;
00616                 }
00617                 i++;
00618             }
00619         }
00620         if (linep == linein) break;
00621         linep = linep->next;
00622     }
00623 }
00624 
00625 /* cursin - mem, offc - view */
00626 void wrap_offset_in_line(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, TextLine *linein, int cursin, int *offl, int *offc)
00627 {
00628     int i, j, start, end, chars, max, chop;
00629     char ch;
00630 
00631     *offl = *offc = 0;
00632 
00633     if (!st->text) return;
00634     if (!st->wordwrap) return;
00635 
00636     max = wrap_width(st, ar);
00637 
00638     start = 0;
00639     end = max;
00640     chop = 1;
00641     *offc = 0;
00642     cursin = txt_utf8_offset_to_index(linein->line, cursin);
00643 
00644     for (i = 0, j = 0; linein->line[j]; j += BLI_str_utf8_size(linein->line + j)) {
00645 
00646         /* Mimic replacement of tabs */
00647         ch = linein->line[j];
00648         if (ch == '\t') {
00649             chars = st->tabnumber - i % st->tabnumber;
00650             if (i < cursin) cursin += chars - 1;
00651             ch = ' ';
00652         }
00653         else
00654             chars = 1;
00655 
00656         while (chars--) {
00657             if (i - start >= max) {
00658                 if (chop && i >= cursin) {
00659                     if (i == cursin) {
00660                         (*offl)++;
00661                         *offc -= end - start;
00662                     }
00663 
00664                     return;
00665                 }
00666 
00667                 (*offl)++;
00668                 *offc -= end - start;
00669 
00670                 start = end;
00671                 end += max;
00672                 chop = 1;
00673             }
00674             else if (ch == ' ' || ch == '-') {
00675                 end = i + 1;
00676                 chop = 0;
00677                 if (i >= cursin)
00678                     return;
00679             }
00680             i++;
00681         }
00682     }
00683 }
00684 
00685 int text_get_char_pos(SpaceText *st, const char *line, int cur)
00686 {
00687     int a = 0, i;
00688     
00689     for (i = 0; i < cur && line[i]; i += BLI_str_utf8_size(line + i)) {
00690         if (line[i] == '\t')
00691             a += st->tabnumber - a % st->tabnumber;
00692         else
00693             a++;
00694     }
00695     return a;
00696 }
00697 
00698 static const char *txt_utf8_get_nth(const char *str, int n)
00699 {
00700     int pos = 0;
00701     while (str[pos] && n--) {
00702         pos += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + pos);
00703     }
00704     return str + pos;
00705 }
00706 
00707 static int text_draw_wrapped(SpaceText *st, const char *str, int x, int y, int w, const char *format, int skip)
00708 {
00709     FlattenString fs;
00710     int basex, i, a, start, end, max, lines; /* view */
00711     int mi, ma, mstart, mend;                /* mem */
00712     
00713     flatten_string(st, &fs, str);
00714     str = fs.buf;
00715     max = w / st->cwidth;
00716     if (max < 8) max = 8;
00717     basex = x;
00718     lines = 1;
00719     
00720     start = 0; mstart = 0;
00721     end = max; mend = txt_utf8_get_nth(str, max) - str;
00722     
00723     for (i = 0, mi = 0; str[mi]; i++, mi += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + mi)) {
00724         if (i - start >= max) {
00725             /* skip hidden part of line */
00726             if (skip) {
00727                 skip--;
00728                 start = end; mstart = mend;
00729                 end += max; mend = txt_utf8_get_nth(str + mend, max) - str;
00730                 continue;
00731             }
00732 
00733             /* Draw the visible portion of text on the overshot line */
00734             for (a = start, ma = mstart; a < end; a++, ma += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + ma)) {
00735                 if (st->showsyntax && format) format_draw_color(format[a]);
00736                 x += text_font_draw_character_utf8(st, x, y, str + ma);
00737             }
00738             y -= st->lheight;
00739             x = basex;
00740             lines++;
00741             start = end; mstart = mend;
00742             end += max; mend = txt_utf8_get_nth(str + mend, max) - str;
00743 
00744             if (y <= 0) break;
00745         }
00746         else if (str[mi] == ' ' || str[mi] == '-') {
00747             end = i + 1; mend = mi + 1;
00748         }
00749     }
00750 
00751     /* Draw the remaining text */
00752     for (a = start, ma = mstart; str[ma] && y > 0; a++, ma += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + ma)) {
00753         if (st->showsyntax && format)
00754             format_draw_color(format[a]);
00755 
00756         x += text_font_draw_character_utf8(st, x, y, str + ma);
00757     }
00758 
00759     flatten_string_free(&fs);
00760 
00761     return lines;
00762 }
00763 
00764 static int text_draw(SpaceText *st, char *str, int cshift, int maxwidth, int draw, int x, int y, const char *format)
00765 {
00766     FlattenString fs;
00767     int *acc, r = 0;
00768     const char *in;
00769 
00770     int w = flatten_string(st, &fs, str);
00771     if (w < cshift) {
00772         flatten_string_free(&fs);
00773         return 0; /* String is shorter than shift */
00774     }
00775     
00776     in = txt_utf8_get_nth(fs.buf, cshift);
00777     acc = fs.accum + cshift;
00778     w = w - cshift;
00779 
00780     if (draw) {
00781         int amount = maxwidth ? MIN2(w, maxwidth) : w;
00782         
00783         if (st->showsyntax && format) {
00784             int a, str_shift = 0;
00785             format = format + cshift;
00786 
00787             for (a = 0; a < amount; a++) {
00788                 format_draw_color(format[a]);
00789                 x += text_font_draw_character_utf8(st, x, y, in + str_shift);
00790                 str_shift += BLI_str_utf8_size(in + str_shift);
00791             }
00792         }
00793         else text_font_draw(st, x, y, in);
00794     }
00795     else {
00796         while (w-- && *acc++ < maxwidth)
00797             r += st->cwidth;
00798     }
00799 
00800     flatten_string_free(&fs);
00801 
00802     if (cshift && r == 0)
00803         return 0;
00804     else if (st->showlinenrs)
00805         return r + TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC;
00806     else
00807         return r + TXT_OFFSET;
00808 }
00809 
00810 /************************ cache utilities *****************************/
00811 
00812 typedef struct DrawCache {
00813     int *line_height;
00814     int total_lines, nlines;
00815 
00816     /* this is needed to check cache relevance */
00817     int winx, wordwrap, showlinenrs, tabnumber;
00818     short lheight;
00819     char cwidth;
00820     char text_id[MAX_ID_NAME];
00821 
00822     /* for partial lines recalculation */
00823     short update_flag;
00824     int valid_head, valid_tail; /* amount of unchanged lines */
00825 } DrawCache;
00826 
00827 static void text_drawcache_init(SpaceText *st)
00828 {
00829     DrawCache *drawcache = MEM_callocN(sizeof (DrawCache), "text draw cache");
00830 
00831     drawcache->winx = -1;
00832     drawcache->nlines = BLI_countlist(&st->text->lines);
00833     drawcache->text_id[0] = '\0';
00834 
00835     st->drawcache = drawcache;
00836 }
00837 
00838 static void text_update_drawcache(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
00839 {
00840     DrawCache *drawcache;
00841     int full_update = 0, nlines = 0;
00842     Text *txt = st->text;
00843 
00844     if (!st->drawcache) text_drawcache_init(st);
00845 
00846     text_update_character_width(st);
00847 
00848     drawcache = (DrawCache *)st->drawcache;
00849     nlines = drawcache->nlines;
00850 
00851     /* check if full cache update is needed */
00852     full_update |= drawcache->winx != ar->winx;               /* area was resized */
00853     full_update |= drawcache->wordwrap != st->wordwrap;       /* word-wrapping option was toggled */
00854     full_update |= drawcache->showlinenrs != st->showlinenrs; /* word-wrapping option was toggled */
00855     full_update |= drawcache->tabnumber != st->tabnumber;     /* word-wrapping option was toggled */
00856     full_update |= drawcache->lheight != st->lheight;         /* word-wrapping option was toggled */
00857     full_update |= drawcache->cwidth != st->cwidth;           /* word-wrapping option was toggled */
00858     full_update |= strncmp(drawcache->text_id, txt->id.name, MAX_ID_NAME); /* text datablock was changed */
00859 
00860     if (st->wordwrap) {
00861         /* update line heights */
00862         if (full_update || !drawcache->line_height) {
00863             drawcache->valid_head  = 0;
00864             drawcache->valid_tail  = 0;
00865             drawcache->update_flag = 1;
00866         }
00867 
00868         if (drawcache->update_flag) {
00869             TextLine *line = st->text->lines.first;
00870             int lineno = 0, size, lines_count;
00871             int *fp = drawcache->line_height, *new_tail, *old_tail;
00872 
00873             nlines = BLI_countlist(&txt->lines);
00874             size = sizeof(int) * nlines;
00875 
00876             if (fp) fp = MEM_reallocN(fp, size);
00877             else fp = MEM_callocN(size, "text drawcache line_height");
00878 
00879             drawcache->valid_tail = drawcache->valid_head = 0;
00880             old_tail = fp + drawcache->nlines - drawcache->valid_tail;
00881             new_tail = fp + nlines - drawcache->valid_tail;
00882             memmove(new_tail, old_tail, drawcache->valid_tail);
00883 
00884             drawcache->total_lines = 0;
00885 
00886             if (st->showlinenrs)
00887                 st->linenrs_tot = (int)floor(log10((float)nlines)) + 1;
00888 
00889             while (line) {
00890                 if (drawcache->valid_head) { /* we're inside valid head lines */
00891                     lines_count = fp[lineno];
00892                     drawcache->valid_head--;
00893                 }
00894                 else if (lineno > new_tail - fp) {  /* we-re inside valid tail lines */
00895                     lines_count = fp[lineno];
00896                 }
00897                 else {
00898                     lines_count = text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, line->line);
00899                 }
00900 
00901                 fp[lineno] = lines_count;
00902 
00903                 line = line->next;
00904                 lineno++;
00905                 drawcache->total_lines += lines_count;
00906             }
00907 
00908             drawcache->line_height = fp;
00909         }
00910     }
00911     else {
00912         if (drawcache->line_height) {
00913             MEM_freeN(drawcache->line_height);
00914             drawcache->line_height = NULL;
00915         }
00916 
00917         if (full_update || drawcache->update_flag) {
00918             nlines = BLI_countlist(&txt->lines);
00919 
00920             if (st->showlinenrs)
00921                 st->linenrs_tot = (int)floor(log10((float)nlines)) + 1;
00922         }
00923 
00924         drawcache->total_lines = nlines;
00925     }
00926 
00927     drawcache->nlines = nlines;
00928 
00929     /* store settings */
00930     drawcache->winx        = ar->winx;
00931     drawcache->wordwrap    = st->wordwrap;
00932     drawcache->lheight     = st->lheight;
00933     drawcache->cwidth      = st->cwidth;
00934     drawcache->showlinenrs = st->showlinenrs;
00935     drawcache->tabnumber   = st->tabnumber;
00936 
00937     strncpy(drawcache->text_id, txt->id.name, MAX_ID_NAME);
00938 
00939     /* clear update flag */
00940     drawcache->update_flag = 0;
00941     drawcache->valid_head  = 0;
00942     drawcache->valid_tail  = 0;
00943 }
00944 
00945 void text_drawcache_tag_update(SpaceText *st, int full)
00946 {
00947     /* this happens if text editor ops are caled from python */
00948     if (st == NULL)
00949         return;
00950         
00951     if (st->drawcache) {
00952         DrawCache *drawcache = (DrawCache *)st->drawcache;
00953         Text *txt = st->text;
00954 
00955         if (drawcache->update_flag) {
00956             /* happens when tagging update from space listener */
00957             /* should do nothing to prevent locally tagged cache be fully recalculated */
00958             return;
00959         }
00960 
00961         if (!full) {
00962             int sellno = BLI_findindex(&txt->lines, txt->sell);
00963             int curlno = BLI_findindex(&txt->lines, txt->curl);
00964 
00965             if (curlno < sellno) {
00966                 drawcache->valid_head = curlno;
00967                 drawcache->valid_tail = drawcache->nlines - sellno - 1;
00968             }
00969             else {
00970                 drawcache->valid_head = sellno;
00971                 drawcache->valid_tail = drawcache->nlines - curlno - 1;
00972             }
00973 
00974             /* quick cache recalculation is also used in delete operator,
00975              * which could merge lines which are adjacent to current selection lines
00976              * expand recalculate area to this lines */
00977             if (drawcache->valid_head > 0) drawcache->valid_head--;
00978             if (drawcache->valid_tail > 0) drawcache->valid_tail--;
00979         }
00980         else {
00981             drawcache->valid_head = 0;
00982             drawcache->valid_tail = 0;
00983         }
00984 
00985         drawcache->update_flag = 1;
00986     }
00987 }
00988 
00989 void text_free_caches(SpaceText *st)
00990 {
00991     DrawCache *drawcache = (DrawCache *)st->drawcache;
00992 
00993     if (drawcache) {
00994         if (drawcache->line_height)
00995             MEM_freeN(drawcache->line_height);
00996 
00997         MEM_freeN(drawcache);
00998     }
00999 }
01000 
01001 /************************ word-wrap utilities *****************************/
01002 
01003 /* cache should be updated in caller */
01004 static int text_get_visible_lines_no(SpaceText *st, int lineno)
01005 {
01006     DrawCache *drawcache = (DrawCache *)st->drawcache;
01007 
01008     return drawcache->line_height[lineno];
01009 }
01010 
01011 int text_get_visible_lines(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, const char *str)
01012 {
01013     int i, j, start, end, max, lines, chars;
01014     char ch;
01015 
01016     max = wrap_width(st, ar);
01017     lines = 1;
01018     start = 0;
01019     end = max;
01020     for (i = 0, j = 0; str[j]; j += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + j)) {
01021         /* Mimic replacement of tabs */
01022         ch = str[j];
01023         if (ch == '\t') {
01024             chars = st->tabnumber - i % st->tabnumber;
01025             ch = ' ';
01026         }
01027         else chars = 1;
01028 
01029         while (chars--) {
01030             if (i - start >= max) {
01031                 lines++;
01032                 start = end;
01033                 end += max;
01034             }
01035             else if (ch == ' ' || ch == '-') {
01036                 end = i + 1;
01037             }
01038 
01039             i++;
01040         }
01041     }
01042 
01043     return lines;
01044 }
01045 
01046 int text_get_span_wrap(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, TextLine *from, TextLine *to)
01047 {
01048     if (st->wordwrap) {
01049         int ret = 0;
01050         TextLine *tmp = from;
01051 
01052         /* Look forwards */
01053         while (tmp) {
01054             if (tmp == to) return ret;
01055             ret += text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, tmp->line);
01056             tmp = tmp->next;
01057         }
01058 
01059         return ret;
01060     }
01061     else return txt_get_span(from, to);
01062 }
01063 
01064 int text_get_total_lines(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
01065 {
01066     DrawCache *drawcache;
01067 
01068     text_update_drawcache(st, ar);
01069     drawcache = (DrawCache *)st->drawcache;
01070 
01071     return drawcache->total_lines;
01072 }
01073 
01074 /* Move pointer to first visible line (top) */
01075 static TextLine *first_visible_line(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, int *wrap_top)
01076 {
01077     Text *text = st->text;
01078     TextLine *pline = text->lines.first;
01079     int i = st->top, lineno = 0;
01080 
01081     text_update_drawcache(st, ar);
01082 
01083     if (wrap_top) *wrap_top = 0;
01084 
01085     if (st->wordwrap) {
01086         while (i > 0 && pline) {
01087             int lines = text_get_visible_lines_no(st, lineno);
01088 
01089             if (i - lines < 0) {
01090                 if (wrap_top) *wrap_top = i;
01091                 break;
01092             }
01093             else {
01094                 pline = pline->next;
01095                 i -= lines;
01096                 lineno++;
01097             }
01098         }
01099     }
01100     else {
01101         for (i = st->top; pline->next && i > 0; i--)
01102             pline = pline->next;
01103     }
01104 
01105     return pline;
01106 }
01107 
01108 /************************ draw scrollbar *****************************/
01109 
01110 static void calc_text_rcts(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, rcti *scroll, rcti *back)
01111 {
01112     int lhlstart, lhlend, ltexth, sell_off, curl_off;
01113     short barheight, barstart, hlstart, hlend, blank_lines;
01114     short pix_available, pix_top_margin, pix_bottom_margin, pix_bardiff;
01115 
01116     pix_top_margin = 8;
01117     pix_bottom_margin = 4;
01118     pix_available = ar->winy - pix_top_margin - pix_bottom_margin;
01119     ltexth = text_get_total_lines(st, ar);
01120     blank_lines = st->viewlines / 2;
01121     
01122     /* nicer code: use scroll rect for entire bar */
01123     back->xmin = ar->winx - 18;
01124     back->xmax = ar->winx;
01125     back->ymin = 0;
01126     back->ymax = ar->winy;
01127     
01128     scroll->xmin = ar->winx - 17;
01129     scroll->xmax = ar->winx - 5;
01130     scroll->ymin = 4;
01131     scroll->ymax = 4 + pix_available;
01132     
01133     /* when re-sizing a view-port with the bar at the bottom to a greater height more blank lines will be added */
01134     if (ltexth + blank_lines < st->top + st->viewlines) {
01135         blank_lines = st->top + st->viewlines - ltexth;
01136     }
01137     
01138     ltexth += blank_lines;
01139 
01140     barheight = (ltexth > 0) ? (st->viewlines * pix_available) / ltexth : 0;
01141     pix_bardiff = 0;
01142     if (barheight < 20) {
01143         pix_bardiff = 20 - barheight; /* take into account the now non-linear sizing of the bar */  
01144         barheight = 20;
01145     }
01146     barstart = (ltexth > 0) ? ((pix_available - pix_bardiff) * st->top) / ltexth : 0;
01147 
01148     st->txtbar = *scroll;
01149     st->txtbar.ymax -= barstart;
01150     st->txtbar.ymin = st->txtbar.ymax - barheight;
01151 
01152     CLAMP(st->txtbar.ymin, pix_bottom_margin, ar->winy - pix_top_margin);
01153     CLAMP(st->txtbar.ymax, pix_bottom_margin, ar->winy - pix_top_margin);
01154 
01155     st->pix_per_line = (pix_available > 0) ? (float) ltexth / pix_available : 0;
01156     if (st->pix_per_line < 0.1f) st->pix_per_line = 0.1f;
01157 
01158     curl_off = text_get_span_wrap(st, ar, st->text->lines.first, st->text->curl);
01159     sell_off = text_get_span_wrap(st, ar, st->text->lines.first, st->text->sell);
01160     lhlstart = MIN2(curl_off, sell_off);
01161     lhlend = MAX2(curl_off, sell_off);
01162 
01163     if (ltexth > 0) {
01164         hlstart = (lhlstart * pix_available) / ltexth;
01165         hlend = (lhlend * pix_available) / ltexth;
01166 
01167         /* the scrollbar is non-linear sized */
01168         if (pix_bardiff > 0) {
01169             /* the start of the highlight is in the current viewport */
01170             if (ltexth && st->viewlines && lhlstart >= st->top && lhlstart <= st->top + st->viewlines) { 
01171                 /* speed the progresion of the start of the highlight through the scrollbar */
01172                 hlstart = ( ( (pix_available - pix_bardiff) * lhlstart) / ltexth) + (pix_bardiff * (lhlstart - st->top) / st->viewlines);   
01173             }
01174             else if (lhlstart > st->top + st->viewlines && hlstart < barstart + barheight && hlstart > barstart) {
01175                 /* push hl start down */
01176                 hlstart = barstart + barheight;
01177             }
01178             else if (lhlend > st->top  && lhlstart < st->top && hlstart > barstart) {
01179                 /*fill out start */
01180                 hlstart = barstart;
01181             }
01182 
01183             if (hlend <= hlstart) { 
01184                 hlend = hlstart + 2;
01185             }
01186 
01187             /* the end of the highlight is in the current viewport */
01188             if (ltexth && st->viewlines && lhlend >= st->top && lhlend <= st->top + st->viewlines) { 
01189                 /* speed the progresion of the end of the highlight through the scrollbar */
01190                 hlend = (((pix_available - pix_bardiff) * lhlend) / ltexth) + (pix_bardiff * (lhlend - st->top) / st->viewlines);
01191             }
01192             else if (lhlend < st->top && hlend >= barstart - 2 && hlend < barstart + barheight) {
01193                 /* push hl end up */
01194                 hlend = barstart;
01195             }                   
01196             else if (lhlend > st->top + st->viewlines && lhlstart < st->top + st->viewlines && hlend < barstart + barheight) {
01197                 /* fill out end */
01198                 hlend = barstart + barheight;
01199             }
01200 
01201             if (hlend <= hlstart) { 
01202                 hlstart = hlend - 2;
01203             }   
01204         }   
01205     }
01206     else {
01207         hlstart = 0;
01208         hlend = 0;
01209     }
01210 
01211     if (hlend - hlstart < 2) { 
01212         hlend = hlstart + 2;
01213     }
01214     
01215     st->txtscroll = *scroll;
01216     st->txtscroll.ymax = ar->winy - pix_top_margin - hlstart;
01217     st->txtscroll.ymin = ar->winy - pix_top_margin - hlend;
01218 
01219     CLAMP(st->txtscroll.ymin, pix_bottom_margin, ar->winy - pix_top_margin);
01220     CLAMP(st->txtscroll.ymax, pix_bottom_margin, ar->winy - pix_top_margin);
01221 }
01222 
01223 static void draw_textscroll(SpaceText *st, rcti *scroll, rcti *back)
01224 {
01225     bTheme *btheme = UI_GetTheme();
01226     uiWidgetColors wcol = btheme->tui.wcol_scroll;
01227     unsigned char col[4];
01228     float rad;
01229     
01230     UI_ThemeColor(TH_BACK);
01231     glRecti(back->xmin, back->ymin, back->xmax, back->ymax);
01232 
01233     uiWidgetScrollDraw(&wcol, scroll, &st->txtbar, (st->flags & ST_SCROLL_SELECT) ? UI_SCROLL_PRESSED : 0);
01234 
01235     uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_ALL);
01236     rad = 0.4f * MIN2(st->txtscroll.xmax - st->txtscroll.xmin, st->txtscroll.ymax - st->txtscroll.ymin);
01237     UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_HILITE, col);
01238     col[3] = 48;
01239     glColor4ubv(col);
01240     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01241     uiRoundBox(st->txtscroll.xmin + 1, st->txtscroll.ymin, st->txtscroll.xmax - 1, st->txtscroll.ymax, rad);
01242     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01243 }
01244 
01245 /************************** draw markers **************************/
01246 
01247 static void draw_markers(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
01248 {
01249     Text *text = st->text;
01250     TextMarker *marker, *next;
01251     TextLine *top, *line;
01252     int offl, offc, i, x1, x2, y1, y2, x, y;
01253     int topi, topy;
01254 
01255     /* Move pointer to first visible line (top) */
01256     top = first_visible_line(st, ar, NULL);
01257     topi = BLI_findindex(&text->lines, top);
01258 
01259     topy = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, top);
01260 
01261     for (marker = text->markers.first; marker; marker = next) {
01262         next = marker->next;
01263 
01264         /* invisible line (before top) */
01265         if (marker->lineno < topi) continue;
01266 
01267         line = BLI_findlink(&text->lines, marker->lineno);
01268 
01269         /* Remove broken markers */
01270         if (marker->end > line->len || marker->start > marker->end) {
01271             BLI_freelinkN(&text->markers, marker);
01272             continue;
01273         }
01274 
01275         wrap_offset(st, ar, line, marker->start, &offl, &offc);
01276         y1 = txt_get_span(top, line) - st->top + offl + topy;
01277         x1 = text_get_char_pos(st, line->line, marker->start) - st->left + offc;
01278 
01279         wrap_offset(st, ar, line, marker->end, &offl, &offc);
01280         y2 = txt_get_span(top, line) - st->top + offl + topy;
01281         x2 = text_get_char_pos(st, line->line, marker->end) - st->left + offc;
01282 
01283         /* invisible part of line (before top, after last visible line) */
01284         if (y2 < 0 || y1 > st->top + st->viewlines) continue;
01285 
01286         glColor3ubv(marker->color);
01287         x = st->showlinenrs ? TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC : TXT_OFFSET;
01288         y = ar->winy - 3;
01289 
01290         if (y1 == y2) {
01291             y -= y1 * st->lheight;
01292             glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
01293             glVertex2i(x + x2 * st->cwidth + 1, y);
01294             glVertex2i(x + x1 * st->cwidth - 2, y);
01295             glVertex2i(x + x1 * st->cwidth - 2, y - st->lheight);
01296             glVertex2i(x + x2 * st->cwidth + 1, y - st->lheight);
01297             glEnd();
01298         }
01299         else {
01300             y -= y1 * st->lheight;
01301             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01302             glVertex2i(ar->winx, y);
01303             glVertex2i(x + x1 * st->cwidth - 2, y);
01304             glVertex2i(x + x1 * st->cwidth - 2, y - st->lheight);
01305             glVertex2i(ar->winx, y - st->lheight);
01306             glEnd();
01307             y -= st->lheight;
01308 
01309             for (i = y1 + 1; i < y2; i++) {
01310                 glBegin(GL_LINES);
01311                 glVertex2i(x, y);
01312                 glVertex2i(ar->winx, y);
01313                 glVertex2i(x, y - st->lheight);
01314                 glVertex2i(ar->winx, y - st->lheight);
01315                 glEnd();
01316                 y -= st->lheight;
01317             }
01318 
01319             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01320             glVertex2i(x, y);
01321             glVertex2i(x + x2 * st->cwidth + 1, y);
01322             glVertex2i(x + x2 * st->cwidth + 1, y - st->lheight);
01323             glVertex2i(x, y - st->lheight);
01324             glEnd();
01325         }
01326     }
01327 }
01328 
01329 /*********************** draw documentation *******************************/
01330 
01331 static void draw_documentation(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
01332 {
01333     TextLine *tmp;
01334     char *docs, buf[DOC_WIDTH + 1], *p;
01335     int i, br, lines;
01336     int boxw, boxh, l, x, y /* , top */ /* UNUSED */;
01337     
01338     if (!st || !st->text) return;
01339     if (!texttool_text_is_active(st->text)) return;
01340     
01341     docs = texttool_docs_get();
01342 
01343     if (!docs) return;
01344 
01345     /* Count the visible lines to the cursor */
01346     for (tmp = st->text->curl, l = -st->top; tmp; tmp = tmp->prev, l++) ;
01347     if (l < 0) return;
01348     
01349     if (st->showlinenrs) {
01350         x = st->cwidth * (st->text->curc - st->left) + TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC - 4;
01351     }
01352     else {
01353         x = st->cwidth * (st->text->curc - st->left) + TXT_OFFSET - 4;
01354     }
01355     if (texttool_suggest_first()) {
01356         x += SUGG_LIST_WIDTH * st->cwidth + 50;
01357     }
01358 
01359     /* top= */ /* UNUSED */ y = ar->winy - st->lheight * l - 2;
01360     boxw = DOC_WIDTH * st->cwidth + 20;
01361     boxh = (DOC_HEIGHT + 1) * st->lheight;
01362 
01363     /* Draw panel */
01364     UI_ThemeColor(TH_BACK);
01365     glRecti(x, y, x + boxw, y - boxh);
01366     UI_ThemeColor(TH_SHADE1);
01367     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
01368     glVertex2i(x, y);
01369     glVertex2i(x + boxw, y);
01370     glVertex2i(x + boxw, y - boxh);
01371     glVertex2i(x, y - boxh);
01372     glEnd();
01373     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
01374     glVertex2i(x + boxw - 10, y - 7);
01375     glVertex2i(x + boxw - 4, y - 7);
01376     glVertex2i(x + boxw - 7, y - 2);
01377     glEnd();
01378     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
01379     glVertex2i(x + boxw - 10, y - boxh + 7);
01380     glVertex2i(x + boxw - 4, y - boxh + 7);
01381     glVertex2i(x + boxw - 7, y - boxh + 2);
01382     glEnd();
01383     UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
01384 
01385     i = 0; br = DOC_WIDTH; lines = 0; // XXX -doc_scroll;
01386     for (p = docs; *p; p++) {
01387         if (*p == '\r' && *(++p) != '\n') *(--p) = '\n';  /* Fix line endings */
01388         if (*p == ' ' || *p == '\t')
01389             br = i;
01390         else if (*p == '\n') {
01391             buf[i] = '\0';
01392             if (lines >= 0) {
01393                 y -= st->lheight;
01394                 text_draw(st, buf, 0, 0, 1, x + 4, y - 3, NULL);
01395             }
01396             i = 0; br = DOC_WIDTH; lines++;
01397         }
01398         buf[i++] = *p;
01399         if (i == DOC_WIDTH) { /* Reached the width, go to last break and wrap there */
01400             buf[br] = '\0';
01401             if (lines >= 0) {
01402                 y -= st->lheight;
01403                 text_draw(st, buf, 0, 0, 1, x + 4, y - 3, NULL);
01404             }
01405             p -= i - br - 1; /* Rewind pointer to last break */
01406             i = 0; br = DOC_WIDTH; lines++;
01407         }
01408         if (lines >= DOC_HEIGHT) break;
01409     }
01410 
01411     if (0 /* XXX doc_scroll*/ > 0 && lines < DOC_HEIGHT) {
01412         // XXX doc_scroll--;
01413         draw_documentation(st, ar);
01414     }
01415 }
01416 
01417 /*********************** draw suggestion list *******************************/
01418 
01419 static void draw_suggestion_list(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
01420 {
01421     SuggItem *item, *first, *last, *sel;
01422     TextLine *tmp;
01423     char str[SUGG_LIST_WIDTH + 1];
01424     int w, boxw = 0, boxh, i, l, x, y, b, *top;
01425     
01426     if (!st || !st->text) return;
01427     if (!texttool_text_is_active(st->text)) return;
01428 
01429     first = texttool_suggest_first();
01430     last = texttool_suggest_last();
01431 
01432     if (!first || !last) return;
01433 
01434     text_pop_suggest_list();
01435     sel = texttool_suggest_selected();
01436     top = texttool_suggest_top();
01437 
01438     /* Count the visible lines to the cursor */
01439     for (tmp = st->text->curl, l = -st->top; tmp; tmp = tmp->prev, l++) ;
01440     if (l < 0) return;
01441     
01442     if (st->showlinenrs) {
01443         x = st->cwidth * (st->text->curc - st->left) + TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC - 4;
01444     }
01445     else {
01446         x = st->cwidth * (st->text->curc - st->left) + TXT_OFFSET - 4;
01447     }
01448     y = ar->winy - st->lheight * l - 2;
01449 
01450     boxw = SUGG_LIST_WIDTH * st->cwidth + 20;
01451     boxh = SUGG_LIST_SIZE * st->lheight + 8;
01452     
01453     UI_ThemeColor(TH_SHADE1);
01454     glRecti(x - 1, y + 1, x + boxw + 1, y - boxh - 1);
01455     UI_ThemeColor(TH_BACK);
01456     glRecti(x, y, x + boxw, y - boxh);
01457 
01458     /* Set the top 'item' of the visible list */
01459     for (i = 0, item = first; i < *top && item->next; i++, item = item->next) ;
01460 
01461     for (i = 0; i < SUGG_LIST_SIZE && item; i++, item = item->next) {
01462 
01463         y -= st->lheight;
01464 
01465         BLI_strncpy(str, item->name, SUGG_LIST_WIDTH);
01466 
01467         w = BLF_width(mono, str);
01468         
01469         if (item == sel) {
01470             UI_ThemeColor(TH_SHADE2);
01471             glRecti(x + 16, y - 3, x + 16 + w, y + st->lheight - 3);
01472         }
01473         b = 1; /* b=1 color block, text is default. b=0 no block, color text */
01474         switch (item->type) {
01475             case 'k': UI_ThemeColor(TH_SYNTAX_B); b = 0; break;
01476             case 'm': UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT); break;
01477             case 'f': UI_ThemeColor(TH_SYNTAX_L); break;
01478             case 'v': UI_ThemeColor(TH_SYNTAX_N); break;
01479             case '?': UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT); b = 0; break;
01480         }
01481         if (b) {
01482             glRecti(x + 8, y + 2, x + 11, y + 5);
01483             UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
01484         }
01485         text_draw(st, str, 0, 0, 1, x + 16, y - 1, NULL);
01486 
01487         if (item == last) break;
01488     }
01489 }
01490 
01491 /*********************** draw cursor ************************/
01492 
01493 static void draw_cursor(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
01494 {
01495     Text *text = st->text;
01496     int vcurl, vcurc, vsell, vselc, hidden = 0;
01497     int x, y, w, i;
01498 
01499     /* Draw the selection */
01500     if (text->curl != text->sell || text->curc != text->selc) {
01501         int offl, offc;
01502         /* Convert all to view space character coordinates */
01503         wrap_offset(st, ar, text->curl, text->curc, &offl, &offc);
01504         vcurl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl) - st->top + offl;
01505         vcurc = text_get_char_pos(st, text->curl->line, text->curc) - st->left + offc;
01506         wrap_offset(st, ar, text->sell, text->selc, &offl, &offc);
01507         vsell = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->sell) - st->top + offl;
01508         vselc = text_get_char_pos(st, text->sell->line, text->selc) - st->left + offc;
01509 
01510         if (vcurc < 0) vcurc = 0;
01511         if (vselc < 0) vselc = 0, hidden = 1;
01512         
01513         UI_ThemeColor(TH_SHADE2);
01514         x = st->showlinenrs ? TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC : TXT_OFFSET;
01515         y = ar->winy - 2;
01516 
01517         if (vcurl == vsell) {
01518             y -= vcurl * st->lheight;
01519             if (vcurc < vselc)
01520                 glRecti(x + vcurc * st->cwidth - 1, y, x + vselc * st->cwidth, y - st->lheight);
01521             else
01522                 glRecti(x + vselc * st->cwidth - 1, y, x + vcurc * st->cwidth, y - st->lheight);
01523         }
01524         else {
01525             int froml, fromc, tol, toc;
01526 
01527             if (vcurl < vsell) {
01528                 froml = vcurl; tol = vsell;
01529                 fromc = vcurc; toc = vselc;
01530             }
01531             else {
01532                 froml = vsell; tol = vcurl;
01533                 fromc = vselc; toc = vcurc;
01534             }
01535 
01536             y -= froml * st->lheight;
01537             glRecti(x + fromc * st->cwidth - 1, y, ar->winx, y - st->lheight); y -= st->lheight;
01538             for (i = froml + 1; i < tol; i++)
01539                 glRecti(x - 4, y, ar->winx, y - st->lheight),  y -= st->lheight;
01540 
01541             glRecti(x - 4, y, x + toc * st->cwidth, y - st->lheight);  y -= st->lheight;
01542         }
01543     }
01544     else {
01545         int offl, offc;
01546         wrap_offset(st, ar, text->sell, text->selc, &offl, &offc);
01547         vsell = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->sell) - st->top + offl;
01548         vselc = text_get_char_pos(st, text->sell->line, text->selc) - st->left + offc;
01549 
01550         if (vselc < 0) {
01551             vselc = 0;
01552             hidden = 1;
01553         }
01554     }
01555 
01556     if (st->line_hlight) {
01557         int x1, x2, y1, y2;
01558 
01559         if (st->wordwrap) {
01560             int visible_lines = text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, text->sell->line);
01561             int offl, offc;
01562 
01563             wrap_offset_in_line(st, ar, text->sell, text->selc, &offl, &offc);
01564 
01565             y1 = ar->winy - 2 - (vsell - offl) * st->lheight;
01566             y2 = y1 - st->lheight * visible_lines + 1;
01567         }
01568         else {
01569             y1 = ar->winy - 2 - vsell * st->lheight;
01570             y2 = y1 - st->lheight + 1;
01571         }
01572 
01573         if (!(y1 < 0 || y2 > ar->winy)) { /* check we need to draw */
01574             x1 = st->showlinenrs ? TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC : TXT_OFFSET;
01575             x2 = x1 + ar->winx;
01576 
01577             glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 32);
01578             
01579             glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
01580             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01581             glRecti(x1 - 4, y1, x2, y2);
01582             glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01583         }
01584     }
01585     
01586     if (!hidden) {
01587         /* Draw the cursor itself (we draw the sel. cursor as this is the leading edge) */
01588         x = st->showlinenrs ? TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC : TXT_OFFSET;
01589         x += vselc * st->cwidth;
01590         y = ar->winy - 2 - vsell * st->lheight;
01591         
01592         if (st->overwrite) {
01593             char ch = text->sell->line[text->selc];
01594             
01595             w = st->cwidth;
01596             if (ch == '\t') w *= st->tabnumber - (vselc + st->left) % st->tabnumber;
01597             
01598             UI_ThemeColor(TH_HILITE);
01599             glRecti(x, y - st->lheight - 1, x + w, y - st->lheight + 1);
01600         }
01601         else {
01602             UI_ThemeColor(TH_HILITE);
01603             glRecti(x - 1, y, x + 1, y - st->lheight);
01604         }
01605     }
01606 }
01607 
01608 /******************* draw matching brackets *********************/
01609 
01610 static void draw_brackets(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
01611 {
01612     TextLine *startl, *endl, *linep;
01613     Text *text = st->text;
01614     int b, fc, find, stack, viewc, viewl, offl, offc, x, y;
01615     int startc, endc, c;
01616     
01617     char ch;
01618 
01619     // showsyntax must be on or else the format string will be null
01620     if (!text->curl || !st->showsyntax) return;
01621 
01622     startl = text->curl;
01623     startc = text->curc;
01624     b = text_check_bracket(startl->line[startc]);
01625     if (b == 0 && startc > 0) b = text_check_bracket(startl->line[--startc]);
01626     if (b == 0) return;
01627 
01628     linep = startl;
01629     c = startc;
01630     fc = txt_utf8_offset_to_index(linep->line, startc);
01631     endl = NULL;
01632     endc = -1;
01633     find = -b;
01634     stack = 0;
01635     
01636     /* Don't highlight backets if syntax HL is off or bracket in string or comment. */
01637     if (!linep->format || linep->format[fc] == 'l' || linep->format[fc] == '#')
01638         return;
01639 
01640     if (b > 0) {
01641         /* opening bracket, search forward for close */
01642         fc++;
01643         c += BLI_str_utf8_size(linep->line + c);
01644         while (linep) {
01645             while (c < linep->len) {
01646                 if (linep->format && linep->format[fc] != 'l' && linep->format[fc] != '#') {
01647                     b = text_check_bracket(linep->line[c]);
01648                     if (b == find) {
01649                         if (stack == 0) {
01650                             endl = linep;
01651                             endc = c;
01652                             break;
01653                         }
01654                         stack--;
01655                     }
01656                     else if (b == -find) {
01657                         stack++;
01658                     }
01659                 }
01660                 fc++;
01661                 c += BLI_str_utf8_size(linep->line + c);
01662             }
01663             if (endl) break;
01664             linep = linep->next;
01665             c = 0;
01666             fc = 0;
01667         }
01668     }
01669     else {
01670         /* closing bracket, search backward for open */
01671         fc--;
01672         if (c > 0) c -= linep->line + c - BLI_str_prev_char_utf8(linep->line + c);
01673         while (linep) {
01674             while (fc >= 0) {
01675                 if (linep->format && linep->format[fc] != 'l' && linep->format[fc] != '#') {
01676                     b = text_check_bracket(linep->line[c]);
01677                     if (b == find) {
01678                         if (stack == 0) {
01679                             endl = linep;
01680                             endc = c;
01681                             break;
01682                         }
01683                         stack--;
01684                     }
01685                     else if (b == -find) {
01686                         stack++;
01687                     }
01688                 }
01689                 fc--;
01690                 if (c > 0) c -= linep->line + c - BLI_str_prev_char_utf8(linep->line + c);
01691             }
01692             if (endl) break;
01693             linep = linep->prev;
01694             if (linep) {
01695                 if (linep->format) fc = strlen(linep->format) - 1;
01696                 else fc = -1;
01697                 if (linep->len) c = BLI_str_prev_char_utf8(linep->line + linep->len) - linep->line;
01698                 else fc = -1;
01699             }
01700         }
01701     }
01702 
01703     if (!endl || endc == -1)
01704         return;
01705 
01706     UI_ThemeColor(TH_HILITE);   
01707     x = st->showlinenrs ? TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC : TXT_OFFSET;
01708     y = ar->winy - st->lheight;
01709 
01710     /* draw opening bracket */
01711     ch = startl->line[startc];
01712     wrap_offset(st, ar, startl, startc, &offl, &offc);
01713     viewc = text_get_char_pos(st, startl->line, startc) - st->left + offc;
01714 
01715     if (viewc >= 0) {
01716         viewl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, startl) - st->top + offl;
01717 
01718         text_font_draw_character(st, x + viewc * st->cwidth, y - viewl * st->lheight, ch);
01719         text_font_draw_character(st, x + viewc * st->cwidth + 1, y - viewl * st->lheight, ch);
01720     }
01721 
01722     /* draw closing bracket */
01723     ch = endl->line[endc];
01724     wrap_offset(st, ar, endl, endc, &offl, &offc);
01725     viewc = text_get_char_pos(st, endl->line, endc) - st->left + offc;
01726 
01727     if (viewc >= 0) {
01728         viewl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, endl) - st->top + offl;
01729 
01730         text_font_draw_character(st, x + viewc * st->cwidth, y - viewl * st->lheight, ch);
01731         text_font_draw_character(st, x + viewc * st->cwidth + 1, y - viewl * st->lheight, ch);
01732     }
01733 }
01734 
01735 /*********************** main area drawing *************************/
01736 
01737 void draw_text_main(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar)
01738 {
01739     Text *text = st->text;
01740     TextLine *tmp;
01741     rcti scroll, back;
01742     char linenr[12];
01743     int i, x, y, winx, linecount = 0, lineno = 0;
01744     int wraplinecount = 0, wrap_skip = 0;
01745 
01746     if (st->lheight) st->viewlines = (int)ar->winy / st->lheight;
01747     else st->viewlines = 0;
01748 
01749     /* if no text, nothing to do */
01750     if (!text)
01751         return;
01752     
01753     text_update_drawcache(st, ar);
01754 
01755     /* make sure all the positional pointers exist */
01756     if (!text->curl || !text->sell || !text->lines.first || !text->lines.last)
01757         txt_clean_text(text);
01758     
01759     /* update rects for scroll */
01760     calc_text_rcts(st, ar, &scroll, &back); /* scroll will hold the entire bar size */
01761 
01762     /* update syntax formatting if needed */
01763     tmp = text->lines.first;
01764     lineno = 0;
01765     for (i = 0; i < st->top && tmp; i++) {
01766         if (st->showsyntax && !tmp->format)
01767             txt_format_line(st, tmp, 0);
01768 
01769         if (st->wordwrap) {
01770             int lines = text_get_visible_lines_no(st, lineno);
01771 
01772             if (wraplinecount + lines > st->top) {
01773                 wrap_skip = st->top - wraplinecount;
01774                 break;
01775             }
01776             else {
01777                 wraplinecount += lines;
01778                 tmp = tmp->next;
01779                 linecount++;
01780             }
01781         }
01782         else {
01783             tmp = tmp->next;
01784             linecount++;
01785         }
01786 
01787         lineno++;
01788     }
01789 
01790     text_font_begin(st);
01791     st->cwidth = BLF_fixed_width(mono);
01792     st->cwidth = MAX2(st->cwidth, 1);
01793 
01794     /* draw line numbers background */
01795     if (st->showlinenrs) {
01796         x = TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC;
01797 
01798         UI_ThemeColor(TH_GRID);
01799         glRecti((TXT_OFFSET - 12), 0, (TXT_OFFSET - 5) + TEXTXLOC, ar->winy - 2);
01800     }
01801     else {
01802         st->linenrs_tot = 0; /* not used */
01803         x = TXT_OFFSET;
01804     }
01805     y = ar->winy - st->lheight;
01806     winx = ar->winx - TXT_SCROLL_WIDTH;
01807     
01808     /* draw cursor */
01809     draw_cursor(st, ar);
01810 
01811     /* draw the text */
01812     UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
01813 
01814     for (i = 0; y > 0 && i < st->viewlines && tmp; i++, tmp = tmp->next) {
01815         if (st->showsyntax && !tmp->format)
01816             txt_format_line(st, tmp, 0);
01817 
01818         if (st->showlinenrs && !wrap_skip) {
01819             /* draw line number */
01820             if (tmp == text->curl)
01821                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_HILITE);
01822             else
01823                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
01824 
01825             BLI_snprintf(linenr, sizeof(linenr), "%*d", st->linenrs_tot, i + linecount + 1);
01826             /* itoa(i + linecount + 1, linenr, 10); */ /* not ansi-c :/ */
01827             text_font_draw(st, TXT_OFFSET - 7, y, linenr);
01828 
01829             UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
01830         }
01831 
01832         if (st->wordwrap) {
01833             /* draw word wrapped text */
01834             int lines = text_draw_wrapped(st, tmp->line, x, y, winx - x, tmp->format, wrap_skip);
01835             y -= lines * st->lheight;
01836         }
01837         else {
01838             /* draw unwrapped text */
01839             text_draw(st, tmp->line, st->left, ar->winx / st->cwidth, 1, x, y, tmp->format);
01840             y -= st->lheight;
01841         }
01842 
01843         wrap_skip = 0;
01844     }
01845     
01846     if (st->flags & ST_SHOW_MARGIN) {
01847         UI_ThemeColor(TH_HILITE);
01848 
01849         glBegin(GL_LINES);
01850         glVertex2i(x + st->cwidth * st->margin_column, 0);
01851         glVertex2i(x + st->cwidth * st->margin_column, ar->winy - 2);
01852         glEnd();
01853     }
01854 
01855     /* draw other stuff */
01856     draw_brackets(st, ar);
01857     draw_markers(st, ar);
01858     glTranslatef(0.375f, 0.375f, 0.0f); /* XXX scroll requires exact pixel space */
01859     draw_textscroll(st, &scroll, &back);
01860     draw_documentation(st, ar);
01861     draw_suggestion_list(st, ar);
01862     
01863     text_font_end(st);
01864 }
01865 
01866 /************************** update ***************************/
01867 
01868 void text_update_character_width(SpaceText *st)
01869 {
01870     text_font_begin(st);
01871     st->cwidth = BLF_fixed_width(mono);
01872     st->cwidth = MAX2(st->cwidth, 1);
01873     text_font_end(st);
01874 }
01875 
01876 /* Moves the view to the cursor location,
01877  * also used to make sure the view isn't outside the file */
01878 void text_scroll_to_cursor(SpaceText *st, ScrArea *sa)
01879 {
01880     Text *text;
01881     ARegion *ar = NULL;
01882     int i, x, winx = 0;
01883 
01884     if (ELEM3(NULL, st, st->text, st->text->curl)) return;
01885 
01886     text = st->text;
01887 
01888     for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next)
01889         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
01890             winx = ar->winx;
01891             break;
01892         }
01893     
01894     winx -= TXT_SCROLL_WIDTH;
01895 
01896     text_update_character_width(st);
01897 
01898     i = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->sell);
01899     if (st->wordwrap) {
01900         int offl, offc;
01901         wrap_offset(st, ar, text->sell, text->selc, &offl, &offc);
01902         i += offl;
01903     }
01904 
01905     if (st->top + st->viewlines <= i || st->top > i)
01906         st->top = i - st->viewlines / 2;
01907     
01908     if (st->wordwrap) {
01909         st->left = 0;
01910     }
01911     else {
01912         x = text_draw(st, text->sell->line, st->left, text->selc, 0, 0, 0, NULL);
01913 
01914         if (x == 0 || x > winx)
01915             st->left = text->curc - 0.5 * winx / st->cwidth;
01916     }
01917 
01918     if (st->top < 0) st->top = 0;
01919     if (st->left < 0) st->left = 0;
01920 }
01921 
01922 void text_update_cursor_moved(bContext *C)
01923 {
01924     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01925     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
01926 
01927     text_scroll_to_cursor(st, sa);
01928 }
